General.Name: Vital Energy Inc
General.Description: Vital Energy Inc., a junior oil and gas company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of crude oil and natural gas in Western Canada. The company primarily holds a 50% working interest in the Gull Lake project that includes 9 wells producing crude oil from the Roseray, Cantuar, and Upper Shaunavon formations located in Saskatchewan. It also holds a 100% working interest in the Pennant project, which includes 10 contiguous sections of land located in the southwest Saskatchewan; and Sullivan Lake and Baxter Lake project situated in east central Alberta. In addition, the company Pembina-1, Pembina-2, and Ante Creek situated in west central Alberta. Vital Energy Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 634-6th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0S4
